description.Armor_powers_stat_upgrades: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors
description.satsu.health: Receives a health increase with diferents armors
description.satsu.durability: Receives a durability increase with diferents armors
description.satsu.strength: Receives a strength increase with diferents armors
description.satsu.fall_resistance: You are quite resistant to falls
description.iron.man.mark.1: Your first armor, capable of flying, throwing flames
description.iron.man.mark.2: A stronger armor than the previous one with some improvements, more durability and plasma shots and launching an incredible energy beam
description.iron.man.mark.40: Armor capable of reaching various speeds while running or flying
description.iron.man.mark.47: Armor made with nanotechnology, quite strong
description.iron.man.superior.armor: An endosymbiotic armor, quite strong, capable of launching energy beams to paralyze enemies
description.iron.man.mark.Stealh: Armor capable of making you invisible
description.iron.man.mark.Midas: Armor made of gold able to fly to great heights
description.iron.man.mark.Iron.destroyer: An armor of uru that possesses magical properties
description.ark.upgrade.thing.1: By unlocking this the ark reactor will recharge itself and will not overcharge so as not to damage you
description.ark.upgrade.thing.2: By unlocking this the ark reactor will recharge itself and will not overcharge so as not to damage you when you are using the armor
ability.satsu.flight: When you have some armor in place you will have the ability to fly
ability.satsu.energy_beam: Launch an energy beam from your ark reactor
ability.satsu.Energy.Pulse: By activating this the armor will be able to throw energy from the hands (with right or left click)
ability.satsu.superior.telekinesis: By using the ability you will be able to grab objects on the ground and enemies with your mind
advancements.grave.ht.root.title: HeroTime
omnimenu.grave.ht.toggle_cycletype_on: Omnitrix set to Cycle via Scroll
